snippet.title: Dr. Susan Love's Breast Book
snippet.description: Discusses new developments in screening and diagnostic techniques, cancer treatment and research, genetics and diet, implants, hormone use, and many other topics.

snippet.title: A Review of the Department of Defense's Program for Breast ...
snippet.description: This book evaluates the program's management and achievements to date.

snippet.title: The Breast Cancer Wars : Hope, Fear, and the Pursuit of a ...
snippet.description: In this riveting narrative, Barron H. Lerner offers a superb medical and cultural history of our century-long battle with breast cancer.

snippet.title: 100 Questions & Answers About Breast Cancer
snippet.description: Presents answers to questions about breast cancer, including the risk factors to watch out for, treatment options, and the emotional concerns and issues sufferers experience in their personal lives.

snippet.title: Keeping Abreast: Ways to PREVENT Breast Cancer
snippet.description: This book provides clear strategies to reduce the risk of breast cancer--strategies that are not only based on the author's experience as an oncologist, but also on an extensive review of the scientific literature.

snippet.title: Essential Exercises for Breast Cancer Patients
snippet.description: This book tells you how to asses your readiness for exercise, set personal goals, and advance through the program at a safe and effective pace.

snippet.title: Breast Cancer: 50 Essential Things You Can Do
snippet.description: Breast Cancer: 50 Essential Things You Can Do shows how to get well and stay well by: --Understanding your diagnosis --Determining your treatment --Managing your medical care --Transforming your diet --Designing a vitamin and mineral ...

snippet.title: Bathsheba's Breast: Women, Cancer, and History
snippet.description: Documents the celebrated 1967 article by an Italian surgeon who concluded that Rembrandt's model and mistress, Hendrickje Stoffels, died of breast cancer, and continues with a narrative history of the disease, its treatments, and several of ...

snippet.title: Breast Cancer Epidemiology
snippet.description: Several chapters are also devoted to clinical aspects of breast cancer including screening, diagnosis and treatment, and survival. As a result, this is the most up-to-date and comprehensive book on breast cancer epidemiology available.

snippet.title: A Review of the Department of Defense's Program for Breast ...
snippet.description: This book evaluates the program's management and achievements to date.
